title: Priyanka Chopra prays to Hindu goddess Durga during publicity tour in India for The Sky Is Pink
text:
She's in India busily promoting her Hindi-language film The Sky Is Pink.

But on Sunday, Proyanka Chopra took a little time out to offer prayers to the Hindu goddess Durga.

The 37-year-old actress posed for photographs at the shrine to the goddess of war erected for the 72nd North Bombay Sarbojanin Durga Puja Samiti festival in Mumbai.

Devotions: She's in India busily promoting her Hindi-language film The Sky Is Pink. But on Sunday, Priyanka Chopra took a little time out to offer prayers to the Hindu goddess Durga

Chopra wore a long-sleeved white coat embroidered with colorful flowers and foliage over a full-length silk sari.

She had a pale green and gold shawl that was draped over one shoulder.

Her dark hair was loose around her shoulders and she accessorized with large round earrings and sported dark red lip color.

Posed: The 37-year-old actress was photographed at the shrine to the goddess of war at a Mumbai festival. She wore a long-sleeved white coat embroidered with colorful flowers

Traditional dress: She had a pale green and gold shawl that was draped over one shoulder. Her dark hair was loose around her shoulders

In The Sky Is Pink, Chopra, who is married to pop star Nick Jonas, stars with Indian actor Farhan Akhtar in the story of a couple's relationship as narrated by their dead daughter.

Speaking about the movie, she recently told the Times of India that it requires the audience to invest both their 'brain and heart'.

'This is a very special film based on a special real-life couple who thrive through extraordinary circumstances,' the former Quantico star said.

'I feel like in a cynical world today where we live our own lives, this film shows you what it can do when you have a family, family support.'
